description:
Injuries resulting from someone else's negligence or reckless actions can leave you with physical, emotional and financial struggles that may follow you for years. You may be unable to work and require costly medical treatment on top of your regular bills that keep coming in. The injustice of this is what motivates the attorneys at the law firm of Price Petho & Associates. For over 40 years, they have fought for North Carolina accident victims seeking just compensation following:

  • Car accidents
  • Pedestrian and bicycle accidents
  • Trucking accidents
  • Motorcycle accidents
  • Premises liability claims such as dog bites, negligent security or slip-and-fall accidents
  • Medical malpractice, including birth injuries, nursing home accidents and misdiagnosis
  • Workers' compensation and third-party claims

If you have lost a loved one in an accident caused by someone else's actions, you may have the right to pursue compensation for your losses, including funeral expenses, your loved one's medical bills, the income and services your loved one provided, and other damages. These are complex cases involving investigation and negotiation, and they may also end up in court. You will want a law firm with knowledge and experience, and Price Petho & Associates has a reputation for these qualities.

In many cases, personal injury claims have strict statutes of limitations, which means time may be of the essence in your situation. Contact the law office of Price Petho & Associates in Rockingham, North Carolina, for a free consultation and evaluation of your case. Their attorneys are happy to meet with you face to face or through virtual channels for your health and safety.
